AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tribesman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has not settled into a dedicated role within the tribe and has been assisting in areas that needed more people at the time, mostly helping moving materials, cleaning or patrols around the village edge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: elder Oni tribesman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned many wisdoms of life along the years. Nowadays, [PAWN_pronoun] is teaching and raising the young ones of the tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni cave enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves rocks and digging. [PAWN_pronoun] feels right at home in a dank cave, so long as [PAWN_pronoun] has a pick and a light. However, an incident involving an over-amorous bear has left [PAWN_objective] more than reluctant to deal with animals of any kind.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni mineral seeker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Oni tribes may be close to nature, but they do value metals and minerals as a resource like any other. [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for looking and bringing back such materials for the tribe, and has grown capable of fending for [PAWN_objective]self outside the settlement.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni stone mason
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves rocks and reshaping it. [PAWN_pronoun] can often be seen gathering or mining the rocks [PAWN_objective]self to personally select the material for [PAWN_possessive] next assigned work by the tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is familiar with the plants [PAWN_possessive] tribe grows, and is tasked on tending them to maturity for harvest. Aside from plantwork, [PAWN_pronoun] also makes sure things are put where they should be, areas kept tidied and keeping a look out inside the village for any problems.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni gatherer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] often goes outside of the settlement to forage for edible plants and berries, being well versed with the surrounding land. [PAWN_pronoun] also assists with the outside patrols with [PAWN_possessive] knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni wild herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] regularly sets out with some of the tribe's animals to let them graze in the wild, and [PAWN_pronoun] has grown quite skilled at handling animals of most kinds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni animal caretaker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] looks after and trains all the animals in the tribe. Along the way, [PAWN_pronoun] learned a bit of medicine from treating the injuries the animals have or deal to others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni weaponsmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a natural talent and love for making blades and weaponry. [PAWN_pronoun] has made sure [PAWN_possessive] tribe has the finest weapons [PAWN_pronoun] can craft.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni weaver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Despite Oni being fine without clothing, it is still important someone can make them properly. [PAWN_nameDef] has learned the techniques and spends most of the time carefully assembling [PAWN_possessive] tribe's favored attire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Tasked with the construction jobs for the tribe, [PAWN_nameDef] has overcome some of the issues his race has when it comes to this kind of job. But no one in the tribe blames [PAWN_objective] if something went wrong, for it is a respected role that only a few can carry out properly.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had the mixed blessing of being a capable cook in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. It means everyone was grateful for fine meals, but [PAWN_pronoun] also often took the blame for bad cases of indigestion. Fortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] has cultivated a fine hand for preparing meals to avoid any grief.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni disaster cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was banned from cooking by [PAWN_possessive] tribe due to an incident none shall ever speak of again. [PAWN_pronoun] since then never looked at cooked meals the same way ever again, and was relegated to looking for ingredients for others on [PAWN_possessive] own.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends the wounds of the warriors and hunters wounded in combat, and to the more mundane illnesses, fevers and injuries among the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] is very well respected for [PAWN_possessive] talents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is known as a respectable alchemist within leagues of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] has learned many medical and other applications of every plant that can be used in the region. Despite [PAWN_possessive] success, it came from having spent so much time alone to achieve all that knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an alchemist for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, practicing with various combination of plants, minerals, and other chemicals to hopefully produce something useful. Was kicked out of the kitchen when a experiment went wrong and set the hut on fire along with half the winter reserves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: travelling trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a brave and open-minded trader, roving the globe searching for deals and opportunities for profit. [PAWN_pronoun] is experienced leading caravan journeys to far reaching settlements and other xeno-colonies to make trade deals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] makes sure [PAWN_possessive] tribe is well fed, learning the game paths and watering holes. [PAWN_pronoun] makes sure to keep the predator numbers down as well, for [PAWN_possessive] own people, and the game they share.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: remote hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter who is often far away from the village for extended period of time with [PAWN_possessive] team. They send back their hunt on a regular basis or left in a set place where other hunter teams can deliver them back home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional hunter. Sometimes called to put down manhunters, or tracking down hostiles to their bases. [PAWN_possessive] skills as a tracker are even able to elude mechanoid sensors trying to catch [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: insect hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter that specialized in hunting down insects for their meat, and became proficient in close combat within caves where the big ones dwell.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: front fighter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rank-and-file soldier for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first line of defence to keep dangerous creatures or people from attacking the village, sometimes raiding other tribes for supplies or people... maybe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a seasoned soldier for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Having been in numerous fights with hostile threats, [PAWN_pronoun] is often seen heading to the troubled areas before anyone else in the tribe knows what is going on.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni champion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is [PAWN_possessive] people's champion. [PAWN_pronoun] has become very skilled in combat after years of defending [PAWN_possessive] tribe from the innumerable threats they had faced.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: shaman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the shaman cast of a large tribe, a group that closely assists the chief in leading the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] is well versed with the lores and legends of the tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Oni tribe chief
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a leader of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. It falls upon [PAWN_objective] guidance to lead the tribe and solving disputes within.
